name: knock_over_pillars_seed42
description: The robot should walk to each of the objects in turn and knock them over such that they are on the floor. It should treat each object as a separate skill.

children.name: walk_to_cylinderColumn1
children.description: The robot should walk to Cylinder Column 1 and stop in front of it, ready to interact.

children.name: knock_over_cylinderColumn1
children.description: The robot should use its body or limbs to push Cylinder Column 1 until it falls completely onto the floor.

children.description: The robot should use its body or limbs to push Cylinder Column 2 until it falls completely onto the floor.
